name: Rewinder (theotherlars)
description:
Rewinder is my submission to Brackeys Jam 2020.2 where the theme was 'Rewind'.

Everything is all made from scratch by me, except for the backgrounds (thanks natewren.com). 

I really enjoyed my first ever game jam and I'm looking forward to the next one already!  

Either try the game on Web or use the download button below to play it locally on your PC.

How to play:

Use the WASD/Arrow keys to rewind the tape. 
The keys represent the direction the tape can rotate (if the tape is pointing upwards, the only directions you can go are left or right).

Hope you 'll enjoy the game and see if you can beat my record of 7.57 seconds!

Check out my website to play my other games https://seidgames.com (still under construction)
